level.heading: Posting of act and regulations on premises; distribution of copies to employers.

level.text: Every employer who is subject to any provision of this subchapter or any regulation issued under this subchapter shall keep a copy or summary of this subchapter and any applicable regulation issued under this subchapter, in a form prescribed or approved by the Mayor, posted in a conspicuous and accessible place in or about the premises at which any employee covered by the regulation is employed.
Employers shall be furnished copies or summaries of this subchapter by the Mayor on request without charge.
